Text: Keys don't work. Only get trial version for 91 days.

Why bother? Keys will be blacklisted.

Save yourself from babysitting your AV. Install Microsoft Security Essentials / Avast / Malwarebytes /etc. Subscription AV is useless.
Is it by default a 91 days trial version? or is it giving 91 days trial after entering the one year license key? Kindly anyone clarify.

it's a modifed version of kaspersky even the key is blacklisted, after installing this added 9 trojans scanned with malware bytes to my computer so the pc shutdowns automatically, had to use system restore to fix this...
just a warning before downloading this..
Yes. Waste of time. It refused to uninstall and I had to use KAV remover tool to get it uninstalled. Don't use it at all.
